air-temperature.md.title: Air temperature
air-temperature.md.desc: Air temperature at a vertical reference height

dew-point-temperature.md.title: Dew point temperature
dew-point-temperature.md.description: The temperature at which dew forms

forecast-horizon.md.title: Forecast horizon
forecast-horizon.md.description: Future time span of the forecast

mean-wave-direction.md.title: Mean wave direction
mean-wave-direction.md.description: The average or representative direction waves are coming from

mean-wind-velocity.md.title: Mean wind velocity
mean-wind-velocity.md.desc: Average Wind velocity at a reference height usually expressed as speed and direction from

peak-period.md.title: Peak period
peak-period.md.description: The period of waves with most energy in a sea state or wave partition

sea.md.title: Sea
sea.md.description: Part of the sea state that is being actively generated by the wind

significant-wave-height.md.title: Significant wave height
significant-wave-height.md.description: Significant wave height is the average of the top one-third highest waves

spectral-parameters.md.title: Spectral parameters
spectral-parameters.md.description: Single numbers describing aspects of the sea state

spectral-partition.md.title: Spectral partition
spectral-partition.md.description: Part of the overall wave spectrum that represents a particular wave train such as sea or swell.

storm-surge.md.title: Storm surge
storm-surge.md.description: Change of water level caused by meteorogical phenomena

swell.md.title: Swell
swell.md.description: Part of the sea state that has been remotely generated

wave-spectrum.md.title: Wave spectrum
wave-spectrum.md.description: The wave spectrum quantifies the amount of energy in different wave components in the sea state.
